scenes.scene: Nova speaks to camera in a warm, premium studio. Subtle ember glow.
scenes.say: I’m Nova. If your business feels like a thousand tiny follow-ups… I can take that off your plate.

scenes.scene: A soft overlay shows: Lead → Reply → Follow-up → Booked call, with calm checkmarks.
scenes.say: You message me once. I handle the replies, the follow-ups, the scheduling. You just show up.

scenes.scene: Close shot: inbox items get tagged and turned into next steps. Minimal CRM cards slide into place.
scenes.say: Every lead gets a next step. Every conversation gets captured. Nothing slips.

scenes.scene: A simple dashboard: Today: replies sent • follow-ups scheduled • call booked. Nova smiles slightly.
scenes.say: I don’t need you to change your whole stack. I just make what you already use… work.

scenes.scene: Minimal end card: Business Builders + Nova — AI Micro-Agency + Book a call. Soft ember glow.
scenes.say: If you want more leads without more chaos… I’m ready.
